item.title: Meghan add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Chelsea Handler
item.description: "Laugh loudly, laugh often, and most important, laugh at yourself." -- Chelsea Handler

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You have to know how to accept rejection and reject acceptance." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Jeannette Walls
item.description: "Life is a drama full of tragedy and comedy. You should learn to enjoy the comic episodes a little more." -- Jeannette Walls

item.title: Meghan add a quote by James Frey
item.description: "You only live once, buy Picassos whenever possible. " -- James Frey

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "Laugh. Laugh as much as you can. Laugh until you cry. Cry until you laugh. Keep doing it even if people are passing you on the street saying, "I can't tell if that person is laughing or crying, but either way they seem crazy, let's walk faster." Emote. It's okay. It shows you are thinking and feeling." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Meghan add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere." -- Mae West

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "My life is perfect even when it's not." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Meghan add a quote by John Boyle O'Reilly
Meghan add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Meghan add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Drew Carey
item.description: "Oh, you hate your job? Why didn't you say so? There's a support group for that. It's called EVERYBODY, and they meet at the bar." -- Drew Carey

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Meghan add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears." -- John Lennon

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Eric Roth
item.description: "For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it. I hope you make the best of it. And I hope you see things that startle you. I hope you feel things you never felt before. I hope you meet people with a different point of view. I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the courage to start all over again." -- Eric Roth

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing." -- Ken Kesey

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live 'em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give 'em." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde
